subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With their leading scorers Carmelo Anthony and J. R. Smith shooting a combined 47 for 152 over the last four games, the Knicks have struggled to put up points.
snippet: With their leading scorers Carmelo Anthony and J. R. Smith shooting a combined 47 for 152 over the last four games, the Knicks have struggled to put up points.
